pagination-page.name: page
pagination-page.description: The current page for the result set, defaults to *1*

pagination-per-page.name: per_page
pagination-per-page.description: The total data per page for the result set, defaults to *10*

pagination-sort-dir.name: sort_dir
pagination-sort-dir.description: The direction of sorting for the result set, defaults to *desc*
